701270f-a.title: Bronx: Hoffman Street - 188th Street (East)
701270f-a.text:
2470 to 2464 Hoffman Street, east side, between E. 189th and
E. 188th Streets. The view is southward.
May 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
